title: A Prehistoric Saga 🦖
bullet_points: Journey through the Mesozoic Era, the "Age of Reptiles."
Explore the rise of the first dinosaurs.
Witness their domination and diversification.
Uncover the mystery of their sudden extinction.

title: The Dawn of Dynasties 🥚
bullet_points: Emerged in the Triassic Period (around 230 million years ago).
Started as small, bipedal carnivores like Eoraptor.
Lived in the shadow of other giant reptiles.
An extinction event at the end of the Triassic cleared the way.

title: A World of Giants 🦕
bullet_points: The Jurassic Period: Giant herbivores (Brachiosaurus, Stegosaurus) thrived.
The Cretaceous Period: Apex predators (T-Rex) and diverse species (Triceratops) appeared.
Dinosaurs conquered land, sea, and air.
The planet was a warm, tropical paradise teeming with life.

title: The Great Cataclysm ☄️
bullet_points: Occurred 66 million years ago at the end of the Cretaceous Period.
A massive asteroid, 6 miles wide, struck the Yucatán Peninsula.
The impact triggered global tsunamis, earthquakes, and volcanic eruptions.
An "impact winter" blocked the sun, causing plants and animals to die off.

title: A Lasting Legacy 🦴
bullet_points: Dinosaurs ruled the Earth for over 150 million years.
Their extinction paved the way for the rise of mammals.
Their story is a powerful lesson in evolution and planetary change.
Their direct descendants live on today as birds!
